title: Ticket #45: VM universe network test failures
description:
The test job_vmu_network fails about once every few days. When it fails, it appears that everything goes fine except that the virtual floppy disk used by the test does not contain the expected output. Strangely, an earlier write to the VFD in the very same test does work.

I've tried a few things to debug this, but no luck so far. The next step is to capture the output of the script that executes inside the test VM to see if any error messages appear that provide a clue.
derived_tickets: #883   VM universe refactor
